key.name: window-position
key.description: Most recent window position (x, y)

key.name: window-size
key.description: Most recent window size (width, height)

key.name: window-state
key.summary: The saved state of the window.
key.description: The saved state of the window.

key.name: tabs
key.summary: List of tabs from the last active window.
key.description: List of tabs from the last active window.

key.name: focused-tab
key.summary: The index of the tab that is focused.
key.description: The index of the tab from the saved tabs that is currently focused.

key.name: zoom
key.summary: Default zoom level of new terminal
key.description: Default zoom level of new terminal

key.name: tab-zooms
key.summary: Zoom level of each open terminal
key.description: Zoom level of each open terminal

key.name: scrollback-lines
key.description: The number of scrollback lines of the terminal.

key.name: follow-last-tab
key.summary: Open last active tab path on new tab.
key.description: Defines whether a new tab should have the path of the last active tab.

key.name: remember-tabs
key.summary: Whether open tabs should be remembered on closing (subject to privacy setting).
key.description: Defines whether the terminal should remember the last open tabs and restore them when the terminal is reopened. If the global privacy setting is on, the tabs will not be restored or remembered even if this setting is true.

key.name: alt-changes-tab
key.summary: Defines whether Alt+N goes to nth tab.
key.description: Defines whether Alt+N goes to nth tab.

key.name: audible-bell
key.summary: Whether or not to use an audible bell event alert
key.description: Used when hitting the end of a line like in GTK entries, but also for tab-completion when there are either no or multiple possible completions.

key.name: natural-copy-paste
key.summary: Defined whether to use ctrl-c or ctrl-shift-c for copy
key.description: Enables or disables natural copy paste.

key.name: prefer-dark-style
key.summary: Defined whether to use dark stylesheet from Gtk
key.description: Switches between dark and light style

key.name: foreground
key.description:
The color of the text of the terminal.
The string can be either one of: - A hexadecimal value in the form “#rgb”, “#rrggbb”, “#rrrgggbbb” or ”#rrrrggggbbbb” - A RGB color in the form “rgb(r,g,b)” (In this case the color will have full opacity) - A RGBA color in the form “rgba(r,g,b,a)”

key.name: background
key.description:
The color of the background of the terminal.
The string can be either one of: - A hexadecimal value in the form “#rgb”, “#rrggbb”, “#rrrgggbbb” or ”#rrrrggggbbbb” - A RGB color in the form “rgb(r,g,b)” (In this case the color will have full opacity) - A RGBA color in the form “rgba(r,g,b,a)”

key.name: cursor-color
key.description:
The color of the cursor of the terminal.
The string can be either one of: - A hexadecimal value in the form “#rgb”, “#rrggbb”, “#rrrgggbbb” or ”#rrrrggggbbbb” - A RGB color in the form “rgb(r,g,b)” (In this case the color will have full opacity) - A RGBA color in the form “rgba(r,g,b,a)”

key.name: cursor-shape
key.description: The shape of the cursor of the terminal.

key.name: palette
key.description: Defines the colors of various things in the terminal.

key.name: shell
key.description: Defines the shell to be used by the terminal.

key.name: encoding
key.description: Defines the encoding to be used by the terminal.

key.name: font
key.summary: The default font of the terminal.
key.description: The default font of the terminal. use [Font Name] [Property] [Size]. eg. Droid Sans Mono 12.

key.name: allow-bold
key.description: Defines whether fonts can be bold or not.

key.name: tab-bar-behavior
key.description: Whether to always show tabs, hide tabs when there is only one tab and never show tabs.

key.name: save-exited-tabs
key.description: When a tab is closed, keep it in memory to restore it later or not

key.name: unsafe-paste-alert
key.description: If the user pastes a command that might be considered unsafe (e.g. with sudo or multiple lines), show a warning
